sections.heading: Exemptions
sections.text: 546.006 Exemptions.—The following amusement rides and amusement attractions are exempt from the provisions of ss. 546.001-546.008:

sections.heading: 546.001-546.008 may be cited as the “Amusement Ride and Attraction Insurance Act.”
sections.text: 546.001-546.008 may be cited as the “Amusement Ride and Attraction Insurance Act.”

sections.heading: As used in ss. 546.001-546.008, the term:(1)“Amusement attraction” means any building or structure around, over, or through which persons may move or walk, without the aid of any moving device integral to the building or structure, which building or structure provides amusement, pleasure, thrills, o
sections.text: As used in ss. 546.001-546.008, the term:(1)“Amusement attraction” means any building or structure around, over, or through which persons may move or walk, without the aid of any moving device integral to the building or structure, which building or structure provides amusement, pleasure, thrills, or excitement. This term does not include enterprises principally devoted to the exhibition of products of agriculture, industry, education, science, religion, or the arts.(2)“Amusement ride” means any mechanical device which carries or conveys passengers around, over, or along a fixed or restricted route or course or within a defined area for the purpose of giving its passengers amusement, pleasure, thrills, or excitement.History.—s. 2, ch. 83-110.

sections.heading: The following amusement rides and amusement attractions are exempt from the provisions of ss
